text.div:
Fail Task

OPERATION: Fail Task

Fail this task. The task is transitioned to the failed state.

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INreason0..1CodeableConcept

The reason for failure. If present, this is assigned to the failureReason property of the task.

name: Fail Task
description: Fail this task.  The task is transitioned to the failed state.

parameter.name: reason
parameter.documentation: The reason for failure.  If present, this is assigned to the failureReason property of the task.
